body_html:
@damienmg I tried the 0.1.3. However, this bug still exists...Any ideas?
Arch Linux with gcc 4.9.3

$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --verbose_failures --spawn_strategy=standalone //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
ERROR: /home/test/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/BUILD:5:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/stream_executor:stream_executor':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_rng.cc':
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_runtime.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/host_config.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/builtin_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/device_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/driver_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/surface_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/texture_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/channel_descriptor.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_runtime_api.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/host_defines.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_device_runtime_api.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/driver_functions.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_functions.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_functions.hpp'.
Target //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 84.234s, Critical Path: 80.07s

body:
@damienmg I tried the 0.1.3. However, this bug still exists...Any ideas?
Arch Linux with gcc 4.9.3

```
$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --verbose_failures --spawn_strategy=standalone //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
ERROR: /home/test/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/BUILD:5:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/stream_executor:stream_executor':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_rng.cc':
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_runtime.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/host_config.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/builtin_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/device_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/driver_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/surface_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/texture_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/channel_descriptor.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_runtime_api.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/host_defines.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_device_runtime_api.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/driver_functions.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_functions.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_functions.hpp'.
Target //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 84.234s, Critical Path: 80.07s
```
